movies.title: Mulan
movies.genre: Animation, Adventure, Family, Fantasy, Musical, War
movies.actors: Miguel Ferrer, Harvey Fierstein, Freda Foh Shen, June Foray
movies.plot: To save her father from death in the army, a young maiden secretly goes in his place and becomes one of China's greatest heroines in the process.

movies.title: Finding Nemo
movies.actors: Albert Brooks, Ellen DeGeneres, Alexander Gould, Willem Dafoe
movies.plot: After his son is captured in the Great Barrier Reef and taken to Sydney, a timid clownfish sets out on a journey to bring him home.

movies.title: The Incredibles
movies.actors: Craig T. Nelson, Holly Hunter, Samuel L. Jackson, Jason Lee
movies.plot: A family of undercover superheroes, while trying to live the quiet suburban life, are forced into action to save the world.

movies.title: Toy Story
movies.actors: Tom Hanks, Tim Allen, Don Rickles, Jim Varney
movies.plot: A cowboy doll is profoundly threatened and jealous when a new spaceman figure supplants him as top toy in a boy's room.

movies.title: Toy Story 2
movies.actors: Tom Hanks, Tim Allen, Joan Cusack, Kelsey Grammer
movies.plot: When Woody is stolen by a toy collector, Buzz and his friends vow to rescue him, but Woody finds the idea of immortality in a museum tempting.

movies.title: Toy Story 3
movies.actors: Tom Hanks, Tim Allen, Joan Cusack, Ned Beatty
movies.plot: The toys are mistakenly delivered to a day-care center instead of the attic right before Andy leaves for college, and it's up to Woody to convince the other toys that they weren't abandoned and to return home.

movies.title: Cars
movies.actors: Owen Wilson, Paul Newman, Bonnie Hunt, Larry the Cable Guy
movies.plot: A hot-shot race-car named Lightning McQueen gets waylaid in Radiator Springs, where he finds the true meaning of friendship and family.

movies.title: Ratatouille
movies.genre: Animation, Adventure, Comedy, Drama, Family, Fantasy
movies.actors: Patton Oswalt, Ian Holm, Lou Romano, Brian Dennehy
movies.plot: A rat who can cook makes an unusual alliance with a young kitchen worker at a famous restaurant.
